title: Developer Full Stack
about:
Hey! I’m Germain, 23 years old, freshly graduated in web application development at Henallux. Passionate about computers since always, I enjoy as much exploring new video games as creating tools, whether to automate small everyday tasks or bring slightly crazy ideas to life.
Curious, always eager to discover new technologies, I love taking on challenges and turning my creativity into tangible projects. My goal? To keep learning, coding, experimenting… and most importantly sharing my passion for development with others.
skillsMore: For the full list, check out my GitHub.
